DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Sponsor Coordinating Center 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Clinical Trial Coordinating Center Name (0012,0060) identifies the institution responsible for coordinating the collection of images and associated data for subjects enrolled in the clinical trial.  [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility that is responsible for a type of research study, also called a clinical study, that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:A person or organization that supports or champions something.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
A person or organization that supports or champions something.

Property.preferredDefinition: A facility that is responsible for receiving, editing, processing, analyzing, and storing data generated in a study and that, in addition, has responsibility for coordination of activities required for execution of the study. (CPCRA Glossary)

Concepts.definition: A facility that is responsible for receiving, editing, processing, analyzing, and storing data generated in a study and that, in addition, has responsibility for coordination of activities required for execution of the study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).
